name: Jump Hero (itch) (Rosevolver)
description:
Controls: 

  • Arrow Keys to Move around
  • Up Arrow to Jump
  • X to dash left
  • C to dash right

Asset flip infinite scroller made with no prior coding knowledge in construct 3 for a school project. Im not making any money out of this and I'm only using this platform to share my game so please dont sue me if I use your assets :moyai:
